original_title: Medicare – National Healthcare Exhibition opens at BMICH
original_body_lines: Prime Minister Dinesh Gunawardena opened the Medicare – National Healthcare Exhibition, Sri Lanka’s biggest healthcare exhibition at the BMICH yesterday. Minister Nimal Siripala de Silva, State Minister Sisira Jayakody, former Ministers A.H.M. Fouzie and Rajita Senaratne, Health Secretary J.C. Chandragupta and Medicare President Dr. Amal Harsha de Silva were present on this occasion
